definition: at once/right away/only/just (emphasis)/as early as/already/as soon as/then/in that case/as many as/even if/to approach/to move towards/to undertake/to engage in/to suffer/subjected to/to accomplish/to take advantage of/to go with (of foods)/with regard to/concerning
important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if

sentences.english: We'll be late for the meeting if we stay any longer.
sentences.chinese: 再不走我們開會就要遲到了。

sentences.english: I have to use, for my friction coefficient, m1=1 0.5.
Should the raw flesh change and turn white, he must go to the priest.
sentences.chinese: 紅肉若復原，又變白了，他就要來見祭司。

sentences.english: Hages Andover's option to buying this property is gonna expire by the end of the month.
sentences.chinese: 銀行對於這處房產的購置權月底就要失效了。

sentences.english: Give me home-cooked food, especially hummus.
sentences.chinese: 我就要家鄉菜，尤其是胡姆斯。

sentences.english: Let's say that your test at school is happening the next day.
sentences.chinese: 假設第二天學校就要考試了。

sentences.english: SH is supposed to go to severe winter training very soon.
sentences.chinese: 承憲應該很快就要去接受嚴酷的冬訓了。

sentences.english: The Tourney of Talent is about to begin.
sentences.chinese: 星光燦爛的比賽馬上就要開始了。

sentences.english: I have regionals in two weeks.
sentences.chinese: 兩個星期後我就要比賽了。

sentences.english: However, it may increase the need to de-ice planes more often in the future, they say.
sentences.chinese: 但是，未來對脫冰飛機的需求可能就要增加了。

sentences.english: You need to be tough to survive the jungle.
sentences.chinese: 要在翟林中活下賴就要有堅忍不跋的魚志。

sentences.english: PART of making money in this topsy-turvy world is to see the opportunities others don't.
sentences.chinese: 在這個混亂的世界賺錢，就要看到別人沒發現的機會。

sentences.english: With a digital camera, check the images as you shoot.
sentences.chinese: 如果是數碼相機，拍攝完就要檢查一下。

sentences.english: If we live in the school's dormitory, we should be careful not to disturb others.
sentences.chinese: 如果我們住在學校裏面，就要注意不要打擾到他人。

sentences.english: The idea that she will go abroad for further study made herself excited.
sentences.chinese: 她一想到就要出國深造，激動不已。

sentences.english: The meat will scorch if you don't lower the gas.
sentences.chinese: 如果你不把煤氣調小一點，肉就要焦了。

definition: important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if

at once/right away/only/just (emphasis)/as early as/already/as soon as/then/in that case/as many as/even if/to approach/to move towards/to undertake/to engage in/to suffer/subjected to/to accomplish/to take advantage of/to go with (of foods)/with regard to/concerning
at once/right away/immediately/on horseback (i.e. by military force)
to want to/to feel like/to fancy/to care for sb/desirous of
like that/in that way/or so/so/so very much/about/in that case
to watch from a height or distance/to survey
(emphasizes that sth is precisely or exactly as stated)/precisely/exactly/even/if/just like/in the same way as
